## Source: ossf-package-analysis (dd31269fee3651913ad04ebb491f4b2800b884e18bf1fe58bfdcaa172bedb657)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'ing-feat-grants-granting' @ 200.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
